revision.text:
{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_ItBurnsItBurns}} '''A_ItBurnsItBurns'''
(no parameters)
Plays the sound "human/imonfire" on the VOICE channel.
It also clears the current weapon flash and instantly switches the current weapon sprite to the animation defined in the calling player's FireHands state
This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|StrifePlayer}} and actors inheriting from it.
[[category:Decorate Special action functions]] [[category:Decorate Strife functions]] [[Category:Decorate Restricted functions]] {{DEFAULTSORT:ItBurnsItBurns}}
